_header: Jesu Christ that died on tree
Subjects: Christ, prayers to; prayers, to Christ
_description: A Prayer to Christ — three 12-line stanzas

BLRoy17Cxvii.First Lines:
Ihesu cryste þat dyed on treAnd sofurred pyne for Adam
                    synGyf me gace to worchepe þeFor þe […] I wolde be
                    gyn…
BLRoy17Cxvii.Last Lines:
…And lat hym neuer ouer come hereTo gar me syn as I dyd
                    ere
BLRoy17Cxvii.Note:
Text damaged by damp. 3234 follows without
                    break in text.

Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XVth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1939: 97-8.
